snippet: Three Republicans voted for the bill, which has been debated in one form or another for more than a decade in Congress but has never passed the Senate.
lead_paragraph: Three Republicans voted for the bill, which has been debated in one form or another for more than a decade in Congress but has never passed the Senate.
